courses.name: Individualized Studies Thesis
courses.desc:
The purpose of this course is to offer individualized studies students a change to draw together the parts of their topic by carrying out a sustained piece of research and writing. An adviser, arranged for by the student, directs the thesis and acts as one of its reader. Normally the finished thesis is around 60 pages in length. Note: All who intend to register in AP/INDV 4000 6.00 must submit a thesis proposal to the coordinator by September 30.
Course credit exclusions: None. 

Prior TO FALL 2009: Course credit exclusion:AS/INDV 4000 6.00.
